entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Leaf Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
